entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Rodney
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:50 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ridgetown 5:00 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
Temperature: 0.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: -0.1°C
Wind: E 42 km/h gust 55 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow at times heavy or rain this evening. Local blowing snow. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm except 5 cm over northern sections. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 late this evening then northwest 30 overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:54 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High 6.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 early in the morning then light late in the afternoon. High 6. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:54 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 5. Forecast issued 4:54 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
